news.title: Google undercounts its carbon emissions, report finds
news.summary: Research says Google’s carbon emissions went up by 65% between 2019-2024, not 51% as the tech giant had claimed. Google set a lofty goal of achieving net-zero carbon emissions by 2030. Yet in the years since then, the company has moved in the opposite direction as it invests in energy-intensive artificial intelligence.

news.title: ‘I was constantly scared of what she was going to do’: the troubled life and shocking death of Immy Nunn
news.summary: Immy Nunn, known as Deaf Immy, had nearly 800,000 followers on TikTok. She was attracted by her honest and often funny videos about her deafness and her mental health. Two years after her death, her mother Louise is still trying to understand how she found her way to a pro-suicide forum.

news.title: Women behind the lens: bending over backwards for luck
news.summary: Colombian artist and photographer Isabella Madrid explores the ‘click to be saved’ economy of hope in her project, Lucky Girl Syndrome.

news.title: Donkey Kong Bananza: gorilla finds his groove with Mariah Carey on his shoulder
news.summary: Bananza is built to let you pulverise its destructible environments as you see fit. Bored with jumping through a cave? Batter your way through the wall instead. There’s a cathartic mindlessness to smashing seven shades of stone out of every inch of the ground beneath you.
